ygData.subject: Nagafen Problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok all you Nag killers We attempted Nagafen last night. Giants were all a piece of cake, no deaths and no real problems. Heres the problem we encountered and I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok all you Nag killers

We attempted Nagafen last night.
Giants were all a piece of cake, no deaths and no real problems.

Heres the problem we encountered and I need to know If anyone else has seen
this.

3 of our casters, 2 clerics and 1 enchanter lost the ability to cast spells
during the melee.
I don't mean we were charmed or feared or roared. I mean, all spell and
hotkey functions were gone, as if fear effect continued forever.
We were forced to camp to clear effect.

We could have taken Nag easily if not for this. Losing 2 out of 3 clerics
does sort of affect the outcome of battle.

This is not a bitch nor am I inviting complaints

I need to know if anyone else has encountered this. We had a nice long talk
with our Servers head GM and she wants to know as well so they can fix this.

Thanks in advance

Joatmos
Xegony.
